Activity.Name: Click
Activity.ToolTip: Simulated mouse click

Activity.Name: Double click
Activity.ToolTip: Simulate mouse double click

Activity.Name: Hover
Activity.ToolTip: Simulated mouse hover

Activity.Name: Send Hotkey
Activity.ToolTip: Send a key event to the selected handle

Activity.Name: Input Text
Activity.ToolTip: Send text to the selected window

Activity.Name: Password text
Activity.ToolTip: Send secure text to the selected window

Activity.Name: Activate
Activity.ToolTip: Enables you to activate the specified UI element. For example, it can be used to bring a window to the foreground

Activity.Name: Check
Activity.ToolTip: Make selection or clear other UI elements such as radio buttons and checkboxes

Activity.Name: GetText
Activity.ToolTip: Extract text values from specified UI elements

Activity.Name: SetText
Activity.ToolTip: Write text in selected UI object

Activity.Name: Highlight
Activity.ToolTip: Highlight the specified UI element

Activity.Name: SelectItem
Activity.ToolTip: Select an item from the combo box or list box. When an element is indicated on the screen, a list of all available options is displayed in the activity. Note: Using this activity on a combo box or list box that did not interact with it before running the workflow may cause the activity to raise an error. The best practice to avoid this problem is to add a Click activity that is configured to click the target drop-down menu before executing the Select Item activity.

Activity.Name: SelectMultiItems
Activity.ToolTip: Select multiple items from the combo box or list box. When an element is indicated on the screen, a list of all available options is displayed in the activity.

Activity.Name: SetFocus
Activity.ToolTip: Set keyboard focus to the specified UI element

Activity.Name: UIElementExists
Activity.ToolTip: Enables you to verify that the UI element is present even if it is not visible

Activity.Name: UIElementScope
Activity.ToolTip: a container that allows you to attach to an existing UI element and perform multiple operations on it

Activity.Name: FindChildren
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve a collection of child UI elements based on the specified scope and filter criteria

Activity.Name: Find UI elements
Activity.ToolTip: Wait for the specified UI element to appear on the screen (in the foreground) and return it as a UiElement variable. If you want to find out if an element is enabled, use an activity such as Get Attribute or Wait Attribute and the aastate attribute.

Activity.Name: Find relative elements
Activity.ToolTip: Search for UI elements using locations relative to fixed elements. It should be used when a reliable selector is not available

Activity.Name: Get the root element
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the ancestor UI element that gets the specified UI element

Activity.Name: Screen selection UI
Activity.ToolTip: Allow users to select UI elements or regions on the screen when running a workflow

Activity.Name: Waiting for element to disappear
Activity.ToolTip: Waiting for the specified UI element to disappear from the screen

Activity.Name: Get attribute
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the value of the specified property of the UI element

Activity.Name: Waiting attribute
Activity.ToolTip: Waiting for the value of the UI element property to be equal to the specified string

Activity.Name: Get coordinates
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the bounding rectangle of the specified UI element

Activity.Name: Set the crop area
Activity.ToolTip: Set the clipping area of ​​the UI element

Activity.Name: Screenshot
Activity.ToolTip: Get a screenshot of the specified UI element

Activity.Name: Click text
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the specified string in the UI element and click on it

Activity.Name: Double click on the text
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the specified string in the UI element and double click on it

Activity.Name: Floating text
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the specified string in the UI element and hover over it

Activity.Name: Extract structured data
Activity.ToolTip: Extract data from the specified web page. You can specify which information to extract by providing an XML string in the ExtractMetadata field of the properties panel. By using the Data Crawl Wizard, you can easily generate with all the properties you set.

Activity.Name: Find string position
Activity.ToolTip: Searches for a given string in the UI element and returns another UI element that sets the clipping region to the screen position of the string.

Activity.Name: Get full text
Activity.ToolTip: Use the full-text screen fetch method to extract strings and their information from the specified UI elements. This activity and container can also be automatically generated when performing a screen capture.

Activity.Name: Get visual text
Activity.ToolTip: Use the native screen fetch method to extract strings and their information from the specified UI elements. This activity and container can also be automatically generated when performing a screen capture.

Activity.Name: Find text
Activity.ToolTip: Check if the text is found in the given UI element

Activity.Name: Close the window
Activity.ToolTip: Close the indicated window

Activity.Name: Active window
Activity.ToolTip: Retrieve the current active window and allow you to perform multiple actions in it

Activity.Name: Window maximization
Activity.ToolTip: Window that maximizes the indication

Activity.Name: Window minimization
Activity.ToolTip: Minimize the indicated window

Activity.Name: Window hiding
Activity.ToolTip: Hide the indicated window to make the window completely invisible

Activity.Name: Window display
Activity.ToolTip: Display and activate the specified window

Activity.Name: Restore window
Activity.ToolTip: Restore the specified window to its original size and position

Activity.Name: Moving window
Activity.ToolTip: Change the position and size of the indicator window

Activity.Name: Attach window
Activity.ToolTip: A container that can be attached to an open window and perform multiple actions in it, which is also automatically generated when using the Desktop logger

Activity.Name: Search window
Activity.ToolTip: Find the specified window

Activity.Name: Open browser
Activity.ToolTip: Open a browser on the specified URL and execute multiple activities in it

Activity.Name: Additional browser
Activity.ToolTip: Attach to an open browser and perform multiple actions in it

Activity.Name: Get new page
Activity.ToolTip: Get the newly opened browser page, you need to cooperate to open the browser Or attach a browser to use in the event flow to get a new tab page for a jump

Activity.Name: Go Back
Activity.ToolTip: Returns the history list of the specified browser

Activity.Name: Go Forward
Activity.ToolTip: Advance in the history list of the specified browser

Activity.Name: Navigation
Activity.ToolTip: Navigate the browser to the specified URL

Activity.Name: Refresh
Activity.ToolTip: Reload the page currently displayed in the specified browser

Activity.Name: Homepage
Activity.ToolTip: Navigate to the current home page or start page

Activity.Name: Close page
Activity.ToolTip: Close the browser page

Activity.Name: Inject JS script
Activity.ToolTip: Execute JavaScript code in the context of a web page corresponding to UiElement

Activity.Name: Set web properties
Activity.ToolTip: Set the value of Input
